content: 4 © rosina plane www rosinaplane com round 5 c1 1 chain * 1c 1 chain 1c in corner chain 2b 3f 2b repeat from * 3 more times slip_stitch in beg c to join 9 sts each side 36 sts total round 6 c2 1 chain * 1c 1 chain 1c in corner chain 1f 7b 1f repeat from * 3 more times slip_stitch in beg c to join 11 sts each side 44 sts total note you may find it useful to leave the corner chain markers in place after working this round as you will be working into the front loops of these chains on round 8 round 7 c1 1 chain * 1c 1 chain 1c in corner chain 3b 5f 3b repeat from * 3 more times slip_stitch in beg c to join 13 sts each side 52 sts total round 8 c2 1 chain * 1f 1 chain 2f in round 6 corner chain 1b 1f 7b 1f 1b 1f in round 6 corner chain repeat from * 3 more times slip_stitch in beg f to join 15 sts each side 60 sts total note the first 1f of the 2nd and following reps will be made into the same loop as the final 1f of the previous repeat round 9 c1 1 chain * 1c 1 chain 1c in corner chain 7b 1f 7b repeat from * 3 more times fasten_off using an invisible join and weave in all ends 17 sts each side 68 sts total 5 © rosina plane www rosinaplane com abbreviations and special stitches universal uk us instructions for special stitches rs rs right side ws ws wrong side beg beg beginning chain chain chain chain-space chain-space chain space st st stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch yo yrh yo yarn round hook uk / yarn over us pul pul pull up loop repeat repeat repeat pm pm place marker blo blo back loop only flo flo front loop only fo fasten_off at end of row work 1 chain cut yarn and pull end through c double_crochet single_crochet double_crochet uk single_crochet us worked into the back loop of the corner chains b bldc blsc back loop double_crochet uk back loop single_crochet us double_crochet uk / single_crochet us into blo treble_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet uk / double_crochet us f fltr2d fldc2d front loop treble 2 down uk f front loop double_crochet 2 down us treble_crochet uk / double_crochet us into unused front loop of st or corner chain 2 row down 6 © rosina plane www rosinaplane com invisible join cut yarn leaving at least 15cm 6 in pull yarn tail through st and thread onto a tapestry needle insert needle under both loops of 2nd st of final round in this case it will be the corner chain pull yarn through and insert needle back into last st of round don t pull too tight the loop created in the join should be the same size as your other sts and will
